prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_FAM_SLOW_60PLUS_LATAM",
  "name": "Family Set-and-Forget Slow Cooker (Mexican & Latin American)",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mexican",
      "LatinAmerican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "60Plus"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "SlowOrPressureCooker"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Slow Cooker Citrus Carnitas Tacos",
  "description": "Pork shoulder cooks low and slow with orange, lime, and mild spices, then gets briefly crisped for taco night. Hands-off and family-friendly.",
  "servings": "Serves 4–6",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Trim excess fat from pork shoulder and cut into 8–10 large chunks.",
    "Peel and slice onions into thick wedges.",
    "Smash and peel garlic.",
    "Juice the orange and lime; reserve the juices.",
    "Measure cumin, oregano, salt, and black pepper.",
    "Lightly oil the slow cooker insert with olive oil.",
    "Lay out tortillas, salsa, shredded lettuce, and sliced avocado for serving."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Place onion wedges and garlic in the bottom of the slow cooker.",
    "Add pork shoulder chunks on top.",
    "Sprinkle cumin, oregano, salt, and black pepper over the pork.",
    "Pour in orange juice and lime juice. Tuck in bay leaves.",
    "Cover and cook on Low for 8–10 hours (or High for 5–6 hours) until the pork shreds easily.",
    "Remove bay leaves. Transfer pork to a tray and shred with two forks.",
    "Skim excess fat from the cooking liquid. Ladle about 1 cup of liquid over the shredded pork and toss.",
    "Optional crisp: Spread pork in a thin layer on a baking sheet and broil in the oven for 5–8 minutes until edges crisp, or sear in a hot skillet on the stovetop for 3–5 minutes, tossing once.",
    "Warm tortillas.",
    "Serve carnitas in tortillas with salsa, shredded lettuce, and avocado."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "pork shoulder",
      "quantity": "1.8 kg / 4 lb",
      "preparation": "trimmed, cut into large chunks"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onions",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "wedges"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "4 cloves",
      "preparation": "smashed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "orange",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lime",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cumin",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "2 teaspoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bay leaves",
      "quantity": "2"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortillas",
      "quantity": "12 small"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salsa",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lettuce",
      "quantity": "2 cups",
      "preparation": "shredded"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "avocado",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "LatinAmerican",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "60Plus"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "SlowOrPressureCooker",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
